ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.NAME: I'm Bassam
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: I’m a versatile developer with experience in frontend, integration, and software development. As a Frontend Developer, I’ve built responsive, user-focused applications with Angular, transforming designs from Figma into pixel-perfect web pages. At MILLENSYS, I specialize in integrating healthcare systems using Mirth Connect, optimizing SQL databases, and enabling real-time API communication. My work with the Egypt Army involved developing VB.NET desktop applications, automating processes with Python, and managing large-scale SQL Server databases. I’m passionate about performance optimization, seamless user experiences, and delivering reliable, innovative solutions.
